body:
With the end of the group stages and a break before the single elimination, I thought I'd share some interesting facts about the group stages:

  1. Only three teams went undefeated: Insidia, Cacalmarin and Bad Company
  2. Despite not physically breaking a single monument, Insidia siezed first place in Group A
  3. BerzerkV2 was the only team to lose the first match and still advance
  4. Impact has played less than 10 minutes total during the tournament. 
  5. TheCrazyBeaners are the only team to lose to an eliminated team (Allah) and still advance
  6. Fortissimus went 1-1-1 and had 1 as their overall monument score

Got any other facts that you'd found interesting? Share them.

title: Interesting Tournament Facts

replies.body: Bad Company is the only team to win a match with only 30 seconds left!!!!!!!!!
replies.body_tagged: Bad Company is the only team to win a match with only 30 seconds left!!!!!!!!!

Round 1: 4 no-shows.
Round 2: 3 no-shows.
Round 3: 3 no-shows.
